name: Humans, Orcs and Elves
description:
This game was made for the   Game Dev Network - Game Jam

You have to save the world from the evil. Erverytime you die, you will revive in another world, stronger and better!

Defeat all three bosses in every world to save  them.

Creators:
SvenPl: Programming
ChiliBonbon: Programming,  Art, Music, Sounds
